snippet: City officials in Asheville, N.C., are considering regulating an abundance of buskers who, like the tourists who flock there, have found the resurgent city irresistible.
abstract: Asheville, NC, lawmakers are looking for a way to control burgeoning population of buskers who have made the city a street-music capital; Asheville is in midst of renaissance thanks to growing arts scene, but city officials need to address dangerously crowded sidewalks and subset of musicians who are little more than panhandlers.
lead_paragraph: City officials in Asheville, N.C., are considering regulating an abundance of buskers who, like the tourists who flock there, have found the resurgent city irresistible.

headline.main: With This Many Buskers in Asheville, a Discordant Note Was Inevitable
headline.print_headline: With This Many Buskers, a Discordant Note Was Inevitable
